A quiver that uses the power of an earthen beast's poison. It's strong powers alow it to harness powers from many other quivers. Though the powers of this great quiver have been harnessed by few it is still very well known.
An armor forged from a tortoise's skin. It is slightly weaker than other armors, but it's enchantment from Oryx provides a speed boost to the user.

A legendary tome designed by grand priests to damage their foes.

A dangerous orb whose very existence is unstable, many have sought after its power to move through legions unscathed.

A fatal sword enchanted with the black magic of the dark mages designed to make the world do its bidding.
